page.title: 03Shops in Four Lanes.
page.content: There are four shops in the village three of them sell very similar items the other is a motor accesories shop.The others are called: The Post Office. The Central Stores. The Bungalow Stores. These shops sell general items of food,some fresh vegetables, newspapers, milk, bread. The Post Office issues pensions and sells stamps as well. The Central Store has an "off-licence" and is licensed to sell wines and spirits.Newspapers are delivered to the door by girls and boys willing to add to their weekly pocket money.
